mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW REVIEW_NUM, GOODS_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, REVIEW_CNT, REVIEW_REGDATE, REVIEW_GRADE, REVIEW_IMG VALUES( REVIEW_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{GOODS_NUM}, #{MEMBER_NUM}, #{REVIEW_CNT}, SYSDATE, #{REVIEW_GRADE}, #{REVIEW_IMG} )
mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_NUM, GOODS_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, REVIEW_CNT, REVIEW_REGDATE, REVIEW_GRADE, REVIEW_IMG FROM REVIEW WHERE GOODS_NUM = #{GOODS_NUM} ORDER BY REVIEW_REGDATE DESC

SELECT REVIEW_NUM, GOODS_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, REVIEW_CNT, REVIEW_REGDATE, REVIEW_GRADE, REVIEW_IMG FROM REVIEW WHERE GOODS_NUM = #{GOODS_NUM} AND REVIEW_GRADE = #{REVIEW_GRADE} ORDER BY REVIEW_REGDATE DESC
